Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of brown pottery vessel, the interior is slightly grooved and lightly smeared with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of at least three lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394408) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394408)
